answers.answer: I'm kinda in the same situation, at last u/s I was 28w but baby was measuring 31/32w. They have told me its a bigger baby but havnt estimated weight. When they measure my uterus it measures spot on for size. I have another u/s to check and they are talking about inducing me early.
Hmmm I wonder if and when they will change my due date. I have passed 1 hr glucose test but now have to take 3 hr glucose test at 10 am today...I really hope I do not have gestational diabetes!
Actually my little sis who is pregnant now at 28weeks my nephew weighed 4lbs already and she now 31 weeks with 8weeks to but according to her doc they say my nephew  wont  make it till augest 4th
I don't know the weight I'm my little guy but at my last appointment I was 37 weeks measuring 44 cm...my next appointment is tomorrow so here's for hoping it hasn't changed!!

question: Ok I know ultrasounds are not completely accurate..I had to have one yesterday and my son was already measuring 5 1/2 pounds at 31 weeks. When my doctor measured from pubic bone to top of uterus I was 5/6 cm bigger than I should be. There has to be ladies out there that have gone through or that are going through the same thing? Please share experiences! Thank you!!
title: a big baby boy?
